entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:46 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -11.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 12:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

Visibility: 32.2 km

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:10 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:10 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:10 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
